features: 【Colored File Folders】This is a set of colored file folders with pockets, 6/Pack Assorted Color three hole punch folders.use binder folders with pockets and Holes in standard 3-ring binders or alone. The pastel style colours file folders will give you a relaxed and cheerful feeling.

【Standard Letter Size】These heavy duty plastic folders with 3-hole and 2-pocket fit 3-ring binder and 8.5"x11" letter size paper perfectly. 2 inner pockets,One business card slot. You can neatly stack 50 pages of letter size paper per pocket.

【Durable & Sturdy Folders With Pockets】Heavy duty folder for binders is made of high-quality polyethylene material,are made using heat press molding technology and are extremely strong. These plastic file folders are water resistant, bend resistant and scratch-resistant.

【Widely Use】 The binder folders with pockets and holes is lightweight and easy to carry, a good choice for teachers and students.Using the heavy duty plastic pocket folders to create school folders for the upcoming next semester, 3 ring folder for business events,offices, school folders to hold important project documents, and more.

【Quality Assurance】 If you have any questions about the SortieOwl 3 hole folders with pockets, you can enjoy the warranty service based on Amazon policy and a friendly reply within 24 hours after the sale,we will give you a satisfactory answer. your satisfaction is our greatest expectation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing to find wrong with these colorful folders
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and also have multiple house “projects” where I like grouping papers together so I can find them quickly when needed. These folders help me out nicely.Colors are restful fun pastels (as in not bright neon).Folders are made from sturdy plastic that have reinforced seams. These should hold up nicely.Two interior pockets that are somewhat flexible to hold more than a couple sheets of paper.A matte finish so not too slippery to hold onto…and as someone else mentioned, these show no fingerprints.They fit my 3-ring binder nicelyBusiness card slot if folks are still doing that.I think the price on these is quite a good value for a 6-pack of folders. I would order again and can recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars sturdy, with cheerful colors
reviews.reviewText: I've used many hundreds of manila folders during 30+ years of being an educator, and I have dozens of dog-eared tattered folders laying around my home office that I keep reusing over and over. When I started my taxes this year, I finally decided to skip the junky used folders and splurge on some nice new plastic ones to store my records. You only live once!* I like the different colors, which will help me with organization (I do need help)* I like the sturdy plastic material. It's durable and will never become dog-eared.* I don't have any negatives to report. I will enjoy using them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made with no complaints
reviews.reviewText: The 6 packs of folders are a hit for me.They do not have any flaws or issues in the material, which means they are less likely to break upon first use.It holds regular papers without issues and it also hold a decent amount of them as well.There's no odd smell or weird quirks about this folder pack either like some I have gotten in the past did.They also fit in all the 3-ring binders without an issue.I can recommend this pack of folders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size; ideal for binders
reviews.reviewText: I go through a lot of folders as a music teacher, giving them to my students to hold sheet music in as well as for my own sheet music. They are designed to go inside a binder but work fine on their own, too. The pastel colors are very nice and ideal for students who like to color code. They are made of a kind of plastic or vinyl, so they’re a bit floppy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Disable and cute
reviews.reviewText: I love the thickness of these folders and the colors are so pretty! They add flare to any 3 ring binder and the material ensures they will not tear easily. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plastic folders with pockets
reviews.reviewText: I like these for 3 main reasons—plastic so they will last a looooong time—these are a good quality thick plastic.—3 ring binders usage. I put them in a binder I am using at work but thinking it would be perfect for school/ college—the colors are nice and bright and festiveI always say it’s the simple things that make us happy. These are one of those small joys in life.Nice product at a decent price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage, multiple uses!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to use in my early elementary classroom. These folders are sturdy, brightly colored, and fit into a binder easily. For my purpose, they work well to keep small group work organized, they hold up to 20 copies easily. I also use these to house student work I have collected for individual students, this really helps to keep me organized, especially for documentation purposes. I would recommend these to other teachers, and know they will continue to be used for years to come in my personal classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Look Nice
reviews.reviewText: These are certainly a lot more durable than the paper variety and are a nice combination of a pocket folder, which also has holes and can be used as a holder in a ring binder. The colors are pretty pastel ones and match the pictures exactly. They're not the glossy (read "fingerprint magnet") variety either, which is an added bonus. These are a good pick
